summary: Build a static website for a men's clothing business including founder info (Yash Jaiswal) and phone numbers for contact and ordering.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal monochrome fashion brand logo (mens-clothing-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- High-contrast men’s fashion hero banner with clean studio backdrop (mens-clothing-hero.dim_1600x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page static website for a men’s clothing business that clearly displays: (1) site title “Men’s Clothing Store”, (2) founder line “Founder: Yash Jaiswal”, (3) main contact number “9919031636”, and (4) ordering instruction “Order Now: 9919031626”. All user-facing text must be in English.
Make both phone numbers clickable using tel: links, and label them clearly so users can distinguish general contact vs ordering.

Apply a coherent, modern fashion-forward visual theme (not blue/purple) across the page: consistent typography, spacing, and component styling (hero/header, content sections, and contact/order callouts).

Add generated static images as assets and render them on the landing page: a simple brand logo and a wide hero/banner image that fits the chosen theme. Store images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a static men's clothing website page showing business title, founder info (Yash Jaiswal), main contact number (9919031636), and order contact number (9919031626).

projectName: Static Men's Clothing Website with Founder & Contact Information
